pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa pūgassa saṃghassa sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyattaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.4: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.9: “Bahū, āvuso, saṃghassa dāyakā, bahū saṃghassa bhattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.10: Mayaṃ tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.11: Tumhe ce amhākaṃ na dassatha, atha ko carahi amhākaṃ dassati?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.13: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṃ cīvaraṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā saṃghaṃ bhattena parivisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṃghassa sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyattaṃ, na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dinnanti, te evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.17: Yathāpaṭiyattaṃ cīvaraṃ ayyā chabbaggiyā attano pariṇāmesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.18: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.19: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.20: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.21: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.24: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.26: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.27: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.15: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.18: “idaṃ me, bhante, jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.23: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī attano pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.24: Pariṇate vematiko attano pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.26: Saṃghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṃghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.27: Cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṃghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.28: Puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṃghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.33: kattha demāti pucchiyamāno yattha tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṃ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati tattha dethāti bhaṇati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.43: “Uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā.
